title: Jeanette50
text:
I play bingo only occasionally but play slots a scratch card a few times a week. The reason I don‚Äôt play bingo is like one off your other reviews I have read is that the same names keep coming up no matter what time of day or which bingo house you play. I have tried playing just 6 cards or as many as you could buy, still only the odd win, but never say 1 line then the next two lines or a line then the full house. However, at least a couple of names appeared as winners time and time again, this also used to happen when Gala Bingo was on the TV before the app to play on line. It even happens in the bingo halls the same people win time and time again, when you are waiting for one number it is so maddening when one of those said people call and win the game. In the halls you hear people around you tut tutting and whispering ‚Äúthem again‚Äù , I also know that some have stopped playing Bingo because  of this, as they are limited to only being able to afford the minimal number as they like to most days for the company and chats. Is that what you want New younger players?
I will continue to play the slots etc until I think the Bingo will seem to being played fairer where by lots of different names appear as winners. Frustrated Jeanette50

title: Awful
text: I registered for the ¬£10 deposit get ¬£50 free. Didn‚Äôt realise you can only play certain games but played something else and won ¬£80. Decided to just take it and quit the app. What an absolute joke! So I deposited my ¬£10 but wanted my withdrawal via bank transfer. It does let you do this on the app. Then you get an email that tells you, you can‚Äôt withdraw a different way to the way you deposited so the withdrawal has been cancelled. So then I tried to log back in to withdraw the same way I deposited. Somehow, and even after numerous conversations with gala, this account ended up being closed!!!!! I spoke with customer support via live chat which was painful only to eventually find out that account had been suspended, god only knows why!!!! Then gala gave me another user name which then ended up also being suspended!!! The whole thing was a shambles and I‚Äôm still trying to get my ¬£89 back after sending my driving license twice as proof of ID and address. It will be an absolute miracle if I get this money. I would stay well clear of the app and Gala Bingo customer services!!!

title: Appalling Customer Service!!!
text:
Avoid this app, and this bingo site in general! I signed up and expected to receive a bonus, but was told I couldn‚Äôt have it because I used PayPal (this detail was never specified on any of their ads or their sign up pages). I tried to talk to their live chat team about this and was connected twice to a useless worker called Alison who refused to help me. She replied a couple times before abruptly ending the chat, and the second time around she didn‚Äôt even reply to my messages at all! 

There‚Äôs no point playing Gala Bingo if they can‚Äôt be more specific with their sign up rules. Not once did it say I couldn‚Äôt receive a bonus if I used PayPal, and I don‚Äôt understand how that is even a rule to begin with! PayPal is used online to protect people‚Äôs data, if we can‚Äôt use it then what‚Äôs the point in giving us the option?! Why shouldn‚Äôt we get the same benefits as everybody else who signs up? In my eyes, I‚Äôm fully entitled to the ¬£50 bonus but chances are I won‚Äôt see it because the customer service team are completely ignorant. Waste of bloody time!!!

title: Be very cautious with this site
text: I decided to join this gala bingo site  last night I put in all my details correctly checked them wrote down my user name and password they took my ten pound and hey presto after taken my ten pound out of my bank I had trouble logging in in fact after numerous attempts at trying to signing  in with all the correct details as I wrote it all down I couldn‚Äôt log in I sent emails to be told  I refund of money back as I had used the 10 pound  I had taken out of my bank what a load of rubbish I wish I could have logged in in the first place to have used it then in sending another email asking for my money back I was then sent another email saying that unfortunately because my now email doesn‚Äôt match  any details just have used they can‚Äôt refund me my money funny how they can send me emails thought dam right con artist if you ask me a rip off site and total thieves your full of total rubbish and I will be taking this to my local ombudsman for him to deal with !!! Be very cautious of this site and how they work !

title: Your staff and to many issues on ur site since change over
text: I love my gala it‚Äôs got me though some tough times in my life and my bingo buddies are amazing on gala , but the staff of live help and over phone can be a pure nightmare , we as customers should not have to explain to them how and what the promotion and daily games are , they can have been very rude and way to often they give the wrong information which is just unacceptable sorry to say , every member of staff that works for gala here or aboard should know of all your going ons not us explaining to them just to be told they we‚Äôll raise it , and please stop with the 24-72 hours time frame because you never ever abide by them times we always have to chase what gala owes us x

title: Dreadful
text:
Chose to join up to take advantage of the ¬£30 bonus with the ¬£10 deposit. 

Read the small print if you‚Äôre thinking of taking advantage of this offer as there are only certain games you can spend your money on in order to receive the bonus. So I‚Äôm a tenner down, got no bonus money and was almost impossible to access the 10 free spins. 

Stick with tombola and virgin. At least you know where you stand with them and customer services are consistent, unlike the two attempts at live chat on gala

title: Shame app
text:
I just download the app Gala bingo on Friday night to test my luck, in this occasion was my birthday 2 days after.
I got 602¬£ on my luck and I thought to stop and do the withdrawal straight away and make some think special whit my wife on my date! Not! I could, the verification frozen my account and didn‚Äôt accept my documents to prove that was me! Really big deception. I tried many times have a a answer about Wats going, email and fone calls but not one could help me, theirs just sent me deposit of 50¬£ that I put to play. Never in my life I will play again on line.
That‚Äôs a shame for taking money away from people trust to playing online.

title: Hard to win
text: Been playing for a year now I only put in ¬£10 in every so often and I have never won I think its one of them games you have to put in loads of money to increase your changes of winning I have noticed when someone has won a line and it flashes up on the screen to say who has won they have only 4 or 5 numbers left to wait for them to win the house but I have only got 1 or 2 numbers covered it happens all the time and it‚Äôs always the same names that seem to win. I no people that play it and have won but they put in a lot more money than I do so I defo think it‚Äôs a game where u have to put in a good bit of money before you have a chance to win.

title: Compatibility issues
text: I have the iPhone X and most of the games don‚Äôt work it requires you to swipe up to play which on this phone closes the app and to go back home you have to force close the app and restart it so it limits you to a few games which personally I don‚Äôt like to play but basically all games have issues such as I can‚Äôt see my balance unless it‚Äôs in landscape etc and games and the finger tracking seems off like if I‚Äôm tapping spin I will have to tap away from the button to spin just little things like that.

title: Waste of money
text: Not a great site for the slots! Signed up, deposited ¬£200 at the end of my patience and ended up with feeling disappointed and bored I must say. Didn‚Äôt keep me in the game at all during play just kept spinning with lousy pays from ¬£1 spin. Regret signing up thought I would give it a go for the sake of gala being a known site but it‚Äôs not fun at all. If the games were to give something back for me to enjoy during play I wouldn‚Äôt feel as disappointed! Only good thing is the style and graphics are good. Not worth my time I‚Äôm afraid after that poor experience. Where‚Äôs the fair play?

title: Fun
text:
Definitely fun and very addictive. Have won a few times but not a huge amount, mainly in the newbie bingo room. If only newbies could have longer access to those rooms rather than just 1 or 2 weeks max! üôèüèº I seemed to have the best luck in there, that‚Äôs probably why you only get a couple of weeks in there I guess :-P 

Overall though, the CH‚Äôs are really helpful and seem lovely. Just wish you could win a bit more, more often!

title: Dont use !!!
text: I played the slingo games on the gala app and the game crashed without me playing it and still took my money this happened on a few different games resulting in me losing quite a bit of money. I went to customer support to which they said they would sort it, 2 weeks go by and i haven't heard anything so i try and contact them they say they are still looking into it , its been almost a year now and i have not heard anything back i will not be using them again and i advise you to stay away to,totally out of order!!

title: iPad problems

title: Do not download this
text: I‚Äôve put a lot of money into this game ,you barely get anything back I recently got an offer that if I‚Äôd join and wager ¬£10 slots on foxy bingo I‚Äôd get 200 spins 100 on foxy and 100 on gala on the 7th they never came on the 7th so I used the live chat the woman told me I was entitled to them and I just had to wait for them to be rewarded so it‚Äôs now the 8th and I still haven‚Äôt received my spins. title: Gala slots
text: I play the slot games and to start off with they let you win to get you hooked, after that you end up wasting your money on them, I play the hot cross bunnies game and it will give you nudges to help you but say for instance you need 3 nudges to get a winning line then it‚Äôs fixed to just give you just 2 nudges, the game is just fixed to not win at all, going to stop playing it as I‚Äôm wasting my money that could be spent elsewhere, certainly would not recommend gala bingo app to anyone
